com.googlecode.jsendnsca.builders
Class MessagePayloadBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.jsendnsca.builders.MessagePayloadBuilder

public class MessagePayloadBuilder
extends Object

Used to construct a MessagePayload using a builder pattern e.g. 

 MessagePayload payload = new MessagePayloadBuilder()
      .withHostname("localhost")
      .withLevel(Level.CRITICAL)
      .withServiceName("Test Service Name")
      .withMessage("Test Message")
      .create();

Since:
1.2
Author:
Raj.Patel
